text: Pleasantly surprised to see that it's still here after so many decades. Used to come here during the 90s to play snooker at level 2, although right now it's already defunct and no longer there. Overall the shops are those non managed types, so keep your expectations low. Surprisingly enough, the building is very dated but internally is still very well kept and maintained, almost like the previous Peace Centre vibes.
One thing I miss SG is chinatown.. I love the place.. Its one of the best area where you can buy anything that is cheaper than any stores
A lot of shop winding up here.... Business no good

As this building is part of Far East establisment, Fun Toast can collect points if minimum $20 is spent using their app. You can also use the vouchers here.

However, there are many vacant shops open for tenancy..
Our fav drinks is Coconut Mint Latte ❤️😋😍👍🤗🐰
